User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the GovBook portal. This includes requesters, verifying officers, approving authorities, and auditorium managers. Authentication details (like passwords) are assumed to be managed by an external authentication system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

email.description: The user's email address, used for communication and OTP verification.

mobileNumber.description: The user's mobile number, used for OTP verification and communication.

aadharNumber.description: The 12-digit UIDAI Aadhar number for identity verification.

firstName.description: The first name of the user.

lastName.description: The last name of the user.

designation.description: Official designation within the department or organization.

organizationName.description: Full registered name of the organization or government department.

userRoleId.description: Reference to the UserRole entity, defining the user's overarching system role (e.g., RegisteredRequester, VerifyingOfficer).

requesterCategoryId.description: Reference to the RequesterCategory entity, defining the user's booking category (A, B, or C).

registrationDate.description: The date and time when the user's account was registered.

isApprovedForBooking.description: Flag indicating if the user is fully verified and approved to initiate booking requests.
